question: Vayoshreshtha Samman is the National Award presented to:
explanation: Vayoshreshtha Samman is a Scheme of National Awards instituted by the Ministry of Social Justice & Empowerment. Vayoshreshtha Samman is given to eminent senior citizens and institutions in recognition of their service towards the cause of elderly persons. 1<sup>st</sup> October is observed as International Day of Older Persons every year as per United Nation Conventions. The Ministry has been conferring "Vayoshrestha Samman" every year on this day since 2005, to eminent citizens, senior citizens and institutions in recognition of their outstanding services to the elderly people.
